topics.title: Bug Report
topics.content:
## Bug Report

File bug reports and feature requests directly to the Clubhouse project on GitHub.

### Requirements
- The **`gh` CLI** must be installed and authenticated (`gh auth login`)

### Filing a report
Click **+ New Report** in the sidebar to open the report form. Fill in:
- **Type** — Bug or Enhancement
- **Severity** — Low, Medium, High, or Critical
- **Title** — A concise summary of the issue
- **Description** — Detailed description with steps to reproduce

The report is created as a GitHub issue on the Clubhouse repository with the selected label applied and severity prefixed to the title (e.g. `[HIGH] Login fails on startup`).

### Browsing reports
- **My Reports** — Shows issues you have filed, sorted by most recent
- **All Recent** — Shows all recent issues across all reporters

Click any report to view its full details, comments, and metadata.
